summary: This document is an email chain from October 31, 2019, between attorney Bruce Barket and an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) from the Southern District of New York. Barket requests contact information for the lawyers handling the 'Epstein/MCC investigation,' and the AUSA provides the names and contact details of two AUSAs leading that investigation.

persons.name: Bruce Barket
persons.context: Attorney at Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP who sends an email requesting contact information for the lawyers handling the Epstein/MCC investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: An AUSA from the Southern District of New York who responds to Bruce Barket's inquiry by providing the names and contact information of the AUSAs handling the Epstein/MCC investigation.

connections.description: Bruce Barket emails the AUSA to request contact information for prosecutors on the Epstein case, and the AUSA responds with that information.

events.title: Email inquiry about Epstein/MCC investigation
events.description: Attorney Bruce Barket emails an Assistant United States Attorney to request the names and contact information for the lawyers handling the Epstein/MCC investigation.

keyFacts: Attorney Bruce Barket sought contact information for the prosecutors handling the 'Epstein/MCC investigation' in October 2019.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York provided the names and contact details of two AUSAs leading that investigation (names redacted in the text).
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal and investigative activity related to Jeffrey Epstein around the time of his death in August 2019.
The email chain is marked as potentially confidential attorney-client communication or privileged.
The document references an 'Epstein/MCC investigation,' though 'MCC' is not explicitly defined in the text.
